title: QUERY_LOOKUP Operation
description: Retrieves entries from lookup tables defined in mod content and stores them in the execution context for use in rule message generation and logic.

lookup_id.description: Namespaced identifier of the lookup table (e.g., 'music:mood_lexicon').

entry_key.description: Key to retrieve from the lookup's entries object.

result_variable.description: Variable name to store the lookup result in executionContext.evaluationContext.context.

missing_value.description: Optional value to return if lookup table or entry is not found (defaults to undefined).
